cards.title: Glyph
cards.gameplay: When you would play one of your cards, you may play it face-down in any play area instead of resolving its normal effects.
powers: Draw up to 2 cards. You may play a card face-down in any play area or swap 2 of your face-down cards.
incapacitatedAbilities: Reveal and replace the top card of a deck. 1 player may play a card.
1 player draws a card or puts a relic, spell, ritual, rune, or glyph from their trash on top of their deck.

cards.title: Embroidered Cloak
body: The first time each turn {Glyph} is dealt damage, she regains 1 HP.

At the start of your turn, you may discard a card. If you do, {Glyph} is immune to damage, cards in {Glyph}'s play area can only be destroyed by {Glyph}, and cards from other decks cannot be played this turn.

flavorQuotes.text: But we won't{BR}always have supplies!
Every thread can be a{BR}symbol, and every stitch a glyph.

cards.title: Sigiled Blade
body: Increase melee damage dealt by {Glyph} by 1.
powers: {Glyph} deals 1 target 0 or 1 melee damage. If {Glyph} is dealt damage this way, you may put one of your cards into play face-down in any play area for each point of damage dealt this way, then you may play a ritual.

flavorQuotes.text: You can tell me who hired you,{BR}or I can read it in your entrails. It's{BR}all the same to me.

cards.title: Sphere of Nalatukha
body: The first time each turn {Glyph} is dealt damage, you may draw or play a card.

flavorQuotes.text: If you can't play three moves ahead,{BR}at least be difficult to anticipate.

cards.flavorReference: [y=0.80]Brother Stevens, Bastion City: Marked for Death

cards.title: Suntulu's Compendium
powers: Reveal cards from the top of your deck or trash until a ritual is revealed. Put it into your hand. Discard the other revealed cards. If you revealed a card from the top of your deck this way, you may play a card.

flavorQuotes.text: Initiate Ellington, I am{BR}told that you display a rare{BR}aptitude for Ritual Semiotics. This{BR}should assist you in your studies.

cards.title: A Brush With Death
body: At the end of your turn, if you did not play a card, did not use a power, or did not draw a card this turn, or if {Glyph} has 10 or fewer hp, you may draw a card, play a card, or use a power.

flavorQuotes.text: Like me, you stand in the gate.{BR}Let me pass into the world beyond.{BR}Don't let them hold me here!{BR}Cut my tethers, please....

cards.title: Milektitha's Dark Summons
body: You may destroy 1 of your face-down might cards. If you do, {Glyph} deals each target in that card's play area 2 infernal damage.
Destroy any number of your face-down destruction cards. For each card destroyed this way, {Glyph} deals a target in that play area that has not been dealt damage this way 5 cold damage.

flavorQuotes.text: You said if I{BR}gave you a name, you'd let me live!
I said I wouldn't{BR}lay a finger on you.

cards.title: Minetka's Proclamation
body: When this card enters play, destroy any number of your face-down fate cards. For each card destroyed this way, increase or reduce damage dealt by a target in that play area by 1 until this card leaves play.
At the start of your turn, destroy 1 of your face-down might cards in the play area of a target affected this way or destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.text: My fate is for the Norns to{BR}decide, but yours is in my hands!

cards.title: Occluded Marionette
body: You may put a non-indestructible card on top of its deck.

You may destroy 1 of your face-down might cards to put the top card of of a deck in that card's play area into play or shuffle that deck. If a card entered play this way, cards cannot be played from that deck until the start of your next turn.

flavorQuotes.text: [y=0.90]All things, actions, and{BR}events are threads spun along the{BR}web that binds all things. Those threads{BR}don't hear your silly incantations, but speak only the language of symbols.

cards.title: Ritual Circle
body: At the end of your turn, you may put a ritual from your hand under this card.
powers: Play any number of rituals from under this card.

flavorQuotes.text: There are few that{BR}match your skills as a ritualist.
... I've never apologized for what I did{BR}to you... I probably won't. But, just so you{BR}know, I do feel... conflicted.

cards.title: Sympathetic Casting
powers: Select a play area. X on this card = the number of your face-down cards in that area. {Glyph} deals herself and 1 target in that play area X irreducible infernal damage each, then {Glyph} deals that target X fire damage.

flavorQuotes.text: Veren't you saying{BR}zat Bruzer Stevens had a message{BR}for me? Vat vas it?
He said: 'Check.'

cards.title: Unspoken Decree
body: Destroy any number of your face-down cards. For each card destroyed with a matching type, 1 target in that play area:{BR}} [u]death[/u]: is put on top its deck, if not a character.{BR}} [u]destruction[/u]: Deals a target 2 melee damage.{BR}} [u]fate[/u]: [y=0.99]Makes its next damage dealt irreducible.[/y]{BR}} [u]insight[/u]: Prevents the next damage it would deal.

flavorQuotes.text: Vile worm, your evils are{BR}ended. Your blasphemies have blighted{BR}the ears of Kalementu, but how will you{BR}rail against him with no voice?

cards.title: Walking the Web
body: Destroy any number of your face-down insight cards. For each card destroyed this way, reveal the top 2 cards of a deck in that card's play area and put 1 card on the top and 1 on the bottom of that deck.
You may destroy 1 of your face-down might cards to play or discard the top card of a deck in that card's play area.

flavorQuotes.text: You expect me to play{BR}both sides against the other.
Don't be a fool. Why stop at two?

cards.flavorReference: Bastion City: A Spider Never Blinks #7

cards.title: Malediction of Inaala
body: Discard up to 3 cards. {Glyph} deals 1 target X times 2 infernal damage where X = the number of cards discarded in this way.
You may destroy 1 of your face-down might cards. If you do, you may discard any number of cards instead.

flavorQuotes.text: You work for Mathis, right?{BR}Give him a message for me.

cards.title: Return to Silence
body: You may destroy 1 of your face-down might cards. If you do, each non-character, non-target card in that card's play area gains the ongoing keyword this turn.
Destroy any number of your face-down death cards. For each card destroyed this way, destroy an environment, ongoing, or equipment card in that card's play area.

flavorQuotes.text: The dark heart of the{BR}Eldrenwood clouds your vision.{BR}Only it knows your name, but its{BR}name is written on my hand! Return to{BR}the shadow of the stones!

cards.title: Written Future
body: Destroy any number of your face-down cards. For each card destroyed with a matching type, 1 target in that play area:{BR}} [u]death[/u]: is destroyed if it has 3 or fewer hp.{BR}} [u]destruction[/u]: deals itself 2 psychic damage.{BR}} [u]fate[/u]: reduces its next damage dealt by 2.{BR}} [u]insight[/u]: increases its next damage dealt by 2.

flavorQuotes.text: Brother Mathis'{BR}murderer must be brought to justice.{BR}Did anyone see the killer's face?
It... all happened so quickly.
I... was taking notes.
